content.description: Directions: Select the choice that best fits each statement. The following question(s) refer to the histograms below, which show age structure expressed as percentage of population for Countries I, II, and II in 1990.
content.question: Approximately what percent of the population in Country II is under age 15?

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Describe characteristics of an environmental concept, process, or model represented visually.
